Flow.description: Screen flow to allow planners to set up recommendations to open new products
Flow.label: Recommendation | set up new products

recordLookups.name: Get_existing_protection_products
recordLookups.label: Get existing protection products
recordLookups.filterLogic: (1 OR 2) AND (3 OR 4 OR 5) AND (6 OR 7)

recordLookups.name: Get_open_product_recommendation_type_id
recordLookups.label: Get open product recommendation type id

fields.name: explanationDetails
fields.fieldText: Please provide the details needed for {!clientSelectTable.firstSelectedRow.FirstName}'s {!chosenProduct.Name}.

fields.name: Cover_amount
fields.helpText: If this is for a policy which does not pay a lump sum, please provide the annual value.

fields.name: Benefit_payment_frequency
fields.helpText: Please specify this in relation to the cover amount - eg if this is for an Income Protection policy please specify 12*monthly amount and select 'Annually'

fields.name: Should_this_be_placed_in_a_provider_trust
fields.fieldText: Should this be placed in a provider trust?

fields.name: Which_additional_benefits_apply
fields.helpText: Please select as many that apply. Hold 'control' to select multiple options.

value.stringValue: Do any existing products need to be cancelled as a result of this?

fields.name: allDone
fields.fieldText:
Gosh that was fun! Shall we have another go?

If you click 'Next' you'll have the chance to create a new type of recommendation.

fields.name: explanationClientSelect
fields.fieldText: Please choose the client who requires a new product.

fields.name: explanationProductSelect
fields.fieldText: Please select the product below which needs to be set up for {!clientSelectTable.firstSelectedRow.FirstName}.

fields.name: explanationProductSelectJunior
fields.fieldText: Please select the type of product below which needs to be set up for {!clientSelectTable.firstSelectedRow.FirstName}.
